definitions.definition: A pustular, eruptive skin disease of cattle caused by an Orthopoxvirus , with lesions occurring principally on the udder and teats . Human infection may occur from touching cows, and gives immunity to smallpox .

main_definition: A pustular, eruptive skin disease of cattle caused by an Orthopoxvirus , with lesions occurring principally on the udder and teats . Human infection may occur from touching cows, and gives immunity to smallpox .
